title: Equation format
text: The equation format is $$y=mx+b$$ where $$m$$ is the slope and $$b$$ is the y-intercept.

title: Slope
text: Substitute the slope value into the equation. You should be left with $$y=\frac{2}{5} x+b$$. You can eliminate options that don't have $$\frac{2}{5}$$ as a slope

title: Y-intercept
text: Substitute the y-value into the equation. You should be left with $$y=\frac{2}{5} x+4$$
